reviewText: My 8 and 9yr old daughters like it. The 8 year old dances with it on a daily basis.

I'm teaching myself (mother of three who loves dancing)very funky, easy to learn with stopping and starting the DVD.  It's a well put together DVD, I am an ex ballet & Jazz ballet dancers, so I thought it was really cool.  Looking forward to teaching my children aged 2,3,6 years old
This is a great DVD.  We were stars for an hour learning the dance and performing it for family and friends.  I recomend this for hours of family fun and entertainment!
